components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch browser and entering valid url and click on go button
2. Click on Gmail menu from Google home page.
3. Login label is displayed in login screen.

Expected Value:  Signin label is displayed in login screen.
Actual Value: Login label is displayed in login screen.
fields.summary: login screen 'Sign in' label is not displayed. Instead of displaying sign in label displayed login label.

comments.body:
Hi madhavi,

I can't see any relation to Titanium in this report, you'll need to provide more information, including:

> Ti SDK version
> Whether you're using Mobile Web, Android or iOS and the version
> A simple reproducible test case that we can drop into an app.js and run

Thanks for your time.
